definitions.definition: A nap , especially an afternoon one taken during the hottest part of the day in some cultures.
Laid-back attitudes to work or laziness , especially by a Hispanic person.

main_definition: ( countable ) A nap , especially an afternoon one taken during the hottest part of the day in some cultures.
secondary_definitions: ( attributive , sometimes offensive ) Laid-back attitudes to work or laziness , especially by a Hispanic person.
